title: 2021 Evil Insurgent takes on MX and 27.5″ forms, Super Boosts travel to 168mm
content:
For 2021, Evil have launched not one but two Insurgent mountain bikes to choose from. With mullets popping up on many brand menus this year, it is no surprise to see the Evil Insurgent MX released beside the more recognizable 27.5″ Insurgent. The former is pitted for bike park and freeride, while the latter is […]

The post 2021 Evil Insurgent takes on MX and 27.5″ forms, Super Boosts travel to 168mm appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
